name: machined
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
machine
to sew cloth with a sewing machine: I've almost finished making the curtains - I just have to machine the hem.
to cut or shape metal on a machine: Tungsten carbide tools are used extensively for machining steel.
